name: Colton Jenkins
title: Back End Developer
about:
I am a software enthusiast and an adrenaline junkie. I enjoy anything that relates to computer science or involves something dangerous. I'm always up to try something new given life is nothing more than a collection of experiences, both good and bad. When I'm not out thrill seeking I'm typically working on a software project or hanging out with my family watching House or Hannibal. I tend to be a perfectionist when time allows as I see my work as a form of art. I am lucky to be one of the individuals to discover their passion and I continue to love every day I'm doing it!

At a previous employer I was tasked to bring an unstructured tech company to something more functional. With little to no knowledge on how, I was able to discover the existing issues and either fix them or bring them up for further analysis. At the end of my stay there was a development process, new tools making everyday life easier for everyone, and better internal communication throughout leading them to success.

A few personal interests of mine are the following; snowboarding, gaming, cars, drifting, skydiving, paintball, computational genomics, data mining, teaching, automating, and pretty much anything related to computer science or an activity that increases my pulse over 120 BPM.
